title: Man opens a beer stubble with his private parts | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Beer drinkers have come up with some inventive ways to open their beverage but this man might just take the cake for the bravest and most painful method. During a car ride the passenger in light blue shorts can be seen lifting his pants to expose his private parts. Seemingly without a bottle opener in the car - and not wanting to wait till they stop - the man then uses his genitals to twist open the lid of the beer. Scroll down for video The man in bright blue shorts gets ready to open the bottle with his private parts The man twists the bottle cap with his genitals opening the beer Without hesitation the man celebrates his achievement for mankind with a sip of the freshly open beer.
